descriptionText.attr1: 以前的Stub基地，现在是一个民用前哨。
Discovered abandoned near the end of the Outsider wars. This base now houses medical and aid facilities which attempt to re-integrate Stubs into society.
The Stubs, a name that references to their short lives are a mercenary for hire outfit found in many areas of space.
These types of bases serve as recruitment and preparation facilities to those desperate enough to join.

Though it may be hard to imagine being desperate enough, when faced with impossible debt, sickness, or a kidnapped family member, the only option left may be to literally sell your self. To some these are salvation.
The conversion process results in a unidentifiable human, littered with implants, clear from guilt, debt, history and memory. Stubs make the perfect shock troops, following orders without question.
Arrivals to the base find it abandoned, no one is forced into the conversion chambers.
